verses.text: \w Three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w arrived|strong="G1910"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w province|strong="G1885"\w*, \w he|strong="G3588"\w* left \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w* \w and|strong="G2250"\w* \w went|strong="G3767"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G4413"\w* priests \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w leading|strong="G4413"\w* \w men|strong="G4413"\w* \w among|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w laid|strong="G2453"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* information \w before|strong="G4413"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*,

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* answered \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* prison \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w would|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G3195"\w* \w leaving|strong="G1607"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w place|strong="G1722"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w*.

“\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w influential|strong="G1415"\w* \w men|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*,” \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, “\w go|strong="G4782"\w* down \w with|strong="G1722"\w* me, \w and|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w anything|strong="G5100"\w* amiss \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w*, \w charge|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* formally \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G1487"\w*.”

\w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w staying|strong="G1304"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, Festus \w went|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*. \w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w next|strong="G1887"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w took|strong="G2523"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w seat|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Bench, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w ordered|strong="G2753"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G3756"\w* \w brought|strong="G1161"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w On|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w*’s appearance, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* leaders \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G3854"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G2597"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* surrounded \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* serious charges, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w failed|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* establish.

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*’s answer \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* charge \w was|strong="G3588"\w* – ‘\w I|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w not|strong="G3777"\w* committed \w any|strong="G5100"\w* offense \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w or|strong="G3777"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w or|strong="G3777"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* Emperor.’

\w But|strong="G1161"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w wished|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* gain popularity \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* interrupted \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w question|strong="G2919"\w*, “\w Are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G2309"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G1519"\w* \w tried|strong="G2919"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w charges|strong="G3004"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*?”

“\w No|strong="G3762"\w*,” \w replied|strong="G3004"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Emperor’s court, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w tried|strong="G2919"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* wronged \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w yourself|strong="G4771"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w aware|strong="G1921"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w*, \w however|strong="G1161"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* breaking \w the|strong="G2532"\w* law \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w committed|strong="G4238"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* offense deserving \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* ask \w to|strong="G2532"\w* escape \w the|strong="G2532"\w* penalty; \w but|strong="G1161"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* accusations \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w*, \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G5483"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w appeal|strong="G1941"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Emperor.”

\w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* conferring \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w Council|strong="G4824"\w*, answered, “\w You|strong="G1909"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w appealed|strong="G1941"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* Emperor; \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* Emperor \w you|strong="G1909"\w* \w will|strong="G5119"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w*.”

\w Some|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* later \w King|strong="G3588"\w* Agrippa \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Bernice \w came|strong="G2658"\w* down \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* paid \w a|strong="G2532"\w* visit \w of|strong="G2250"\w* congratulation \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*;

\w and|strong="G1161"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w staying|strong="G1304"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w several|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w laid|strong="G1563"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*’s \w case|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w*. “\w There|strong="G1563"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w here|strong="G1510"\w*,” \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*,

“\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w like|strong="G4314"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* hear \w this|strong="G3588"\w* man myself,” Agrippa \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*. “\w You|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* hear \w him|strong="G3588"\w* tomorrow,” \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w answered|strong="G5346"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w next|strong="G1887"\w* \w day|strong="G1887"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* Agrippa \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Bernice \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w full|strong="G4183"\w* \w state|strong="G2596"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Audience Chamber, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* superior officers \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w principal|strong="G1851"\w* \w people|strong="G1525"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w order|strong="G2753"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w brought|strong="G2064"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.
